website_summaries.verdict: A fine assembly of products you can use to enhance all aspects of your car's appearance, from the cleanliness of your exterior (including wheels/bumper) to the interior.
pros: This thoughtful package even includes products to address scratches and stuck-on debris
Everything you need is all in one place, and the price is affordable
cons: Some of the products may not be strong enough for certain cosmetic problems, such as dried-on debris

website_summaries.verdict: 12 pieces lend to detailing perfection to boost the appearance of your car.
pros: 12-piece set gets your car shiny inside and out
Gold Class products wash away dirt while protecting paint
Endurance Tire Gel lasts weeks longer than other products
We love that it comes with the tools to keep your car looking fresh in between detailed washes
cons: Some customers received open or spilled products

customer_reviews.title: Received an empty bottle and a used fake nail!
customer_reviews.text: We opened our package, there was a Meguires box that looked opened and resealed. We dumped it out and someone’s used fake nail came out with our products and one of the bottles (Quick Interor Detailer) was unwrapped and empty. When I unscrewed the bottle there was mold on the liquid sealer. We will probably be returning this and getting the kit from another retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Bri Dobler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. More expensive, but far better than the competition. I bought a set of applicator pads and the trim restorer seperately, things I think should be included. Since my car is only a year old, I only used the interior detailer, shampoo, tire shine, and wax, but the other bottles will come in handy for other cars/ my car in the future. Wax has a deep shine and a slick feel, beads water easily. Tire shine is vivid, not sure how long it will last. Interior mister is good. Non-greasy and removes dust and dirt well. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Such a GREAT DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: Forget Armour All! Once the Mini dealership told me they use Meguiar (Maguire!) products for cars in their shop I've used nothing but them since. I can't get over how inexpensive this set is. I'm going to calculate how much it would cost to buy everything individually. This would make a perfect gift for anyone with a car but especially someone who got a new car. So easy to take care of your car when you have all of these products on hand.
customer_reviews.author: ZenGardener

customer_reviews.title: Scratch product leaked all over everything else..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband for his bday. I'm usually not planning too far ahead, but actually did this time! He opened it tonight, and we discovered the scratch product had leaked all over everything else in the kit. The original amazon box has been in a climate controlled garage for the last couple of months with nothing else stacked on it. Most of the other cleaning supplies inside it are shrink wrapped and the rags can be washed. Just not a very good gift to give when someone opens a box with everything covered in white crusty goo. Not to mention the wasted spend on that particular product. Past the return window now. Just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Penning

customer_reviews.title: I liked the selection
customer_reviews.text: I liked the selection, However, there were products that were dried up and unusable. I was upset since it was a gift for my husband and he was not able to use it. We contacted Meguiars and they stated that the products were discontinued and not able to replace. I will not reorder these products again! Penni Seoane
customer_reviews.author: Penni L Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Product is okay, kind of works
customer_reviews.text: The actual products kind of works, but I've had some issues across all components. Specifically, the indoor detail bottle will clean most things except smaller stains on your seats. The bottle I received also constantly leaks which is incredibly annoying as the back of the bottle warns about extended exposure to the liquid. I would recommend checking out some alternatives before purchasing this kit.
customer_reviews.author: noah

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your bottles aren't broken and dont open on something expensive
customer_reviews.text: Not a happy customer. I bought the stuff because it's the only stuff my son in law uses only to open it up to make sure it's all in there before I wrap it & when I go to pull it out, one of the bottles is leaking ALL OVER MY NEW BED and it had been knicked/sliced before it was shipped. The bottle literally had about a quarter of the product left in it, some was on me, in the box & now on my bed. Truly, not a happy camper with this brand right now. You try cleaning a purple bed with car products on it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna V.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Spray bottle breaks on the first use. If I go through the replacement of the item I have to send it all back. Can't just get a new nosle. Really inconvenient. Thus leaving a poor review.
customer_reviews.author: cselzer

customer_reviews.title: A good product set in general
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product set last week. I tested them out this past Sunday. In general, it's a good product. I read a lot of Youtube videos and webpages before I used it. However, the design of the interior detailer bottle did not work well. it's leaking every time after I sprayed the seats. It is not sealed completely. I am not sure if anyone else has the same issue or I just had bad luck. The scratch X2.0 is ok. It eliminated the very minimal scratches. This is different from what I was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Luwei Xie

customer_reviews.title: Car Clean Therapy
customer_reviews.text: Relax and detail. Every Saturday, I get up and take a few hours and wash the little guy. The kit comes with everything you'll need, assuming you already have a towel at home. The wax lasts me a solid month while the car shines with a regular wash every weekend. Really like it would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo Solorzano Z.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Products!!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to start detailing and washing my own car, so I researched and landed on trying out this kit. It's a popular product, so there's tons of tutorials and trainings on YouTube to help you figure out your best routine. The products shipped quickly and I used it the next day. Very easy to clean the inside and outside of the car, even the wheels! Definitely a great gift or for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Bottles - Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Poor Packaging of the products. One of the spray bottles was leaking from the bottom and was half empty. No one wants to go through the replacement process to get a new set. Not expected from a product deemed as reliable by so many others. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Swadheen Tripathi

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: Seems half this stuff all does the same thing.. I tried, for example, the clear polish and the plastic polish on the same equipment and noticed absolutely no difference. But I'm no expert / cleaning professional. But it's nice to have specialized product for exactly what you want. All the products seem of high quality. I was impressed that the clay product worked just like they say it works. Not a huge difference, but a difference, and that's what it says it will do. The soap/shampoo is of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: PLG

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend this to anyone trying to get started with self-washing ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time owning a new car, so I thought I'd make an attempt to treat it right and take care of the paint coat. You can probably get away with using less shampoo than the instructions imply; this stuff is very concentrated and my suds were a little much. Wish the set included a slightly larger sponge for the waxing process, it was a pain in the a♦♦ to do with that tiny 2-3 inch sponge, but whatever. Can't complain for the price. I'd recommend this to anyone trying to get started with self-washing their car. Love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: Nik Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Really a wonderful kit, especially for a relatively new person to actually maintaining a car's appearance.
customer_reviews.text: Really a wonderful kit, especially for a relatively new person to actually maintaining a car's appearance. I've used Meguiar's products for quite awhile, particularly their wipes and interior detailer (just for basic cleaning and such). However, I just recently bought a truck that I love and decided I wanted to take care of it. This kit really has everything most people would need for their car care regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Great Odin's Raven

customer_reviews.title: Good starting point...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try the clay bar sorcery without just buying clay bars.... so I found this kit which replenished some of my already owned mequiars products. I was definitely surprised by the tire gel as a first time user. ( I usually just do the hot shine compressed air spray bottle. ) the clay bars were kinda neat too. All in all, it was a good Buy and value for the all mighty greenback.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect car solution!
customer_reviews.text: MEGUIAR'S G55032SP Complete Car Care Kit was a perfect gift to myself after I bought my car. I love pampering my car, helps me relax and keeps me occupied. The products gives me a finish that I'd get from a professional cleaning service. The detailing is just too good and the interior sprays aren't too strong unlike other products I used before. They are non-sticky/ non-greasy and easy to use. I simply love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Vishnu

customer_reviews.title: Product shipment issues
customer_reviews.text: Got my package same day.. but 2 of the items had opened/ exploded leaving residue on every item including the micro fiber rag...
customer_reviews.author: Chris powers

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Love Meguiars. Been using their products since my first car in the 80s. Digging this pack, even though I already had the soap and plastic cleaner. One problem though. The bottle for the interior cleaner, the nozzle came broken and it leaks pretty bad. That's why only 4 stars for ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Easter

customer_reviews.title: BIG BUNDLE PACK
customer_reviews.text: great big bundle- Great value bought for someone that details cars would be perfect for a teen with their own car too ! since im older this was perfect to get delivered right to my door as i would not have lifted this huge pack at the store door to door worked great
customer_reviews.author: Caryn and John Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Nice Beginner Home Set
customer_reviews.text: If you price each product individually, this kit is a savings. If you do your own vehicle maintenance you will use every item in the kit but not all at once. Meguiar's products are good medium grade automotive finishing products. Yes, there are better, but price becomes an issue of value over performance. There is nothing wrong with Meguiar's products as a whole because they are good and a great value. If you are a professional, these products are not for you, but for the home or hobby enthusiast, they are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: TexasTea

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I got this to clean the cars. Everything work MEGUIAR'S is a good brand. Nothing was broken when it got it. It was packaged well - i was a little worried because of other review saying their stuff came damaged. It was boxed in another box. Would recommend to anyone looking for a All in one car kit.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need (almost) in one box
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to get your car beautifully clean. No complaints about any of the products included at all. Oh, the tire dressing smells like grape. Don't drink it though, I'm sure it tastes completely the opposite of grape. Also got one of these badboys, which I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tlawson

customer_reviews.title: ... set during amazon's birthday celebration and the value was amazing. You will get a bit of savings at ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set during amazon's birthday celebration and the value was amazing. Bascially comes with everything you need to maintain your car. The clay bar set alone is around 20 bucks.Love that it comes with everything you need to wash your car except maybe the bucket and water. You will get a bit of savings at the current price, but if you don't need all of it there may not be a need to buy this kit. I also prefer other scratch removal products to Scratch X. May be fine with very fine scratches.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kit!
customer_reviews.text: Has lasted for years, granted I only wash my truck every few months. The interior detail cleaner gives a fresh, polished look that is not too glossy, not too dull. I keeo it in my side door with a micro-fiber cloth to do a quick wipe down while stopped at a traffic light.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Description completely incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Description is not correct. Sent a 9 piece kit and the only item the same was the car wash. Didn’t get the products I wanted and a bunch of products I didn’t want
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Duncan

customer_reviews.title: From novice to "pro" in one box
customer_reviews.text: My 30 year old infrequently washed high top van looked really tired and worn. Having little experience properly washing a vehicle, I bought this with hope and trepidation. Wow! I followed the directions (and bought a orbital polisher) and wowza! My mechanic almost didn't recognize my van. This kit makes it easy for the intimidated newbie.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Hill

customer_reviews.title: water works better and leaked bottle
customer_reviews.text: Wash it with water same as this expensive set. Poor packing also. bottle leaked and destroyed other items. RETURNING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Engin

customer_reviews.title: Change packaging
customer_reviews.text: Good kit however the package is not great due to many bottles leaking out when they had never been opened. Not worth the price when whole bottles of product leak out before you notice.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Wont buy again because of damage
customer_reviews.text: Well when received one of bottle was cracked open and stuff was leaking all over ,,didnt have time to return since was christmas gift so taped bottle up and when gave to grandson and he opened it I then handed him the bottle that was leaking.. It was the wheel shine that was leaking ... He told me not to worry he had some already but its not right to get a half bottle of wheel shine when you paid for total kit
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Total Necessity for a Car <3 it!
customer_reviews.text: Cool kit, got it for my brand new white car. This stuff is amazing. After my first scuff i found out the true value of this kit. The back bumper looked hideous after a run in with a greyish blue car, my car looked looked like a disaster. A little help from the kit and a lot of hard rubbing the scratches rubbed off like magic. The interior detailer smells dreamy, makes you want to use it. The rest of the stuff is good to use to detail all the nooks the car wash misses.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Leaks a lot
customer_reviews.text: The products are great and really make the car look great, but all of the spray bottles leak a lot. When I put the spray top on the bottle and tried to tighten it, it didn't tighten much and if I flip the bottle upside down it leaks out. If the bottles aren't vertical then they WILL LEAK. Always take the spray top off and replace it with the original cap to prevent leaking. As a car care product they are good though.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Good but leaky bottles
customer_reviews.text: I liked the kit. The only downside is that the bottles it comes in are leaky. The entire quick detailer bottle leaked out into the trunk. Made such a mess and I only got to use the detailer once!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: They claim 12 items not mine left out clay bars and polish sponge and Gold car wash bottle traveled with loose lid and dumped into box. Fifty Bucks and short changed. Shame....
customer_reviews.author: Methos

customer_reviews.title: A giftable
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of the kits at Christmas presents for $43 each. I opened the cardboard box expecting to see a nice kit to give family members. The items were just all in the box, not a “kit.” I hope the products are better than the presentation.
customer_reviews.author: NMD80

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit for car washing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect kit for those wanting a sort of "all in one" kit for their car care needs. I would suggest however picking up a good drying method as one isn't included and a 5 gallon bucket or a pair of 3 gallon buckets depending on the wash method you use, are also a good addition to this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Containers leaked
customer_reviews.text: I took the products with me to a classic car show. When I got to the show and wanted to detail my car two of the products had leaked everywhere. UGH.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: The car shined like new after using these!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance' was determined to hand wash his Mercedes-Benz C230, so we bought this kit since it had everything he needed. It turned out to be perfect! The instructions for each product were clear. The products in the box were exactly what is shown in the picture and description, and he didn't need to buy anything else to "shampoo," "condition," wax, and clay wax his car! It shined like new when he was finished! Great bunch of products for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great overall care kit. The only item I needed to add was some leather spray. Well and a bunch of microfiber towels. All the products come with very simple instructions. The exterior detail spray works really nice between washes and waxes. I purchased some mini travel spray bottles to keep in my car. I have one with Glass Cleaner, one with Internal Detailer and one with the external detailer, that way I can provide quick touchups even when I am not at home. Works great for when the birds decided to use your car for target practice.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C

customer_reviews.title: Best All-In-One car care kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a Jack and Jill, and was a huge hit. Went back and got another to detail my car AND my motorcycle. Tons of compliments since using this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Paul O'Toole

customer_reviews.title: Great for deep washing, Not so great for paint correction
customer_reviews.text: This kit is a great deal for the price and includes everything you need for deep cleaning your car. it doesn't however contain any correction agent that will work with what is included. if you have any deep scratches or blemishes, consider this along with some ultimate compound. the car wash soap and gold class wax are outstanding. i made my 2004 civic look brand new! the last thing is this kit only includes 1 microfiber towel, YOU WILL NEED MORE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Lund

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for a great product
customer_reviews.text: I have always like the Meguiar products. This was a bargain to get several products in one package. I bought one for a gift and one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dove

customer_reviews.title: Very great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Meguiar’s car wash kit. I’ve been using this for about 3 months and everything in this kit is wonderful. The Carnuaba liquid wax is a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best Kit "Available"!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best kit I have seen on the market for the money! I have used many car care products over the years and the Meguiar's gold class is easily one of the bests on the market! That being said, I wish there was some other options for different products instead of the Scratch and PlastX. I am happy to have those products but it will be some time before I will need them given my vehicle is new. It was cheaper to buy the kit with those 2 items than to buy everything else separately.
customer_reviews.author: Monticello Cyclist

customer_reviews.title: Should have enough of every item to last for multiple years if you're not an every weekend washer like myself. You may need to a
customer_reviews.text: This item has seemingly everything you need to take long lasting care of your car. Should have enough of every item to last for multiple years if you're not an every weekend washer like myself. You may need to add on here and there, like for a drying towel or two, but this is definitely a great starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great Products, Terrible Spray Bottles
customer_reviews.text: The bottles are defective and Meguiar's knows and does not care. I got mine with the Quik Detailer bottle split at the bottom, had leaked everywhere, the towel, mitt and pad soaked. The products work great, but I am only giving 4 stars because these bottles are a recurring problem. If the manufacturer fixes the spray bottles and replace them with a bottle that is not cheap plastic, then it would get a 5 star review
customer_reviews.author: Jurassic Jeep

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The wax keeps beading water. I reapply about every three months, but it's still beading then anyway. The mit is great and I use the micofiber towel all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lostviking

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for car guy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set for the money, gave it to my car enthusiast dad as a gift. He says Maguires products are best! Happy he is happy!
customer_reviews.author: E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: You can't get a better deal on this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone knows Maguiar's is the best, and for the price i paid for this set, its already paid for itself twice! It costs $100+ to get your car detailed at a garage, but doing it yourself gives you the satisfaction of knowing your car looks amazing, and saves you all that cash you would have spent to have a stranger do it for you. The products are high quality, and work beautifully. A clay kit alone can cost $20, and waxes cost anywhere from $10-$20 per bottle/tin, so the value on this is insanely good. My car looks great and i enjoy having all the tools i need to get the job done right.
customer_reviews.author: melrose427

customer_reviews.title: Other then that good products!
customer_reviews.text: Detailed leaked all over during shipping. Other then that good products!
customer_reviews.author: Philip F.

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle of products
customer_reviews.text: Great value for almost everything you need for detailing your vehicle. I would plan on getting some applicator pads and/or microfiber towels along with this. Keep an eye on the price, it can drop into the $30’s but it’s a good deal even in the $40’s.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: I loved this so much, I wish Meguiar's made a men's skin care lineup.
customer_reviews.text: Car turned out fantastic after using nearly using all of the products in the kit. The applicator pad is a thing of beauty and the clay bar is very effective. The liquid wax is smooth and leaves barely any residue, I was done the whole car in about and hour. I think I am able to get 2-3 good washes+waxes out of this kit and depending on how dirty your car is now the only thing you might want to replenish on is clay bar. Works well as a gift or for personal consumption. The quality of the clean is definitely worth the money if you know what you're doing. Great kit and fantastic line of products.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit for the money. I went and priced everything alone and its around $85 if you bought it in store.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Calwell

customer_reviews.title: It worked ok and smelled good but most of the bottles leaked.
customer_reviews.text: Like it said in the headline most of the bottles leaked two so bad I had to throw away without using the product. When I tried to carry it the product just leaked out all over the floor. Bummer. I don't think this set is worth it due to the poor packaging but I will still use the carwash and wax part of it.
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great products. The assortment included in bundle is just right to leave your car or bike looking great. Easy to use, great results.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Prado

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Full size bottles, great quality, great price! What more could you want? Okay....someone to do the detailing for me would be nice. haha! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: I think this would be a great gift for someone who just got a car
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit to compliment my new car. Most of these products I use all the time. However, I find that some products such as the scratch X do not really work and some products you do not use too often, such as the wax and tire endurance. But as for the soaps and quick detailer, that is a must have. Overall, I think this would be a great gift for someone who just got a car!
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: Great do-it-yourself product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff keeps my new baby, fresh dressed and ready to impress. The shipping damaged the bottle of wax, causing it to get over everything. Was able to save half.
customer_reviews.author: Pace

customer_reviews.title: Two bottles were half opened and had already been used ...
customer_reviews.text: Two bottles were half opened and had already been used. One of the towels was still wet! Obviously was used and repackaged. How does no one check for this before sending it out.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Tse

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dime!
customer_reviews.text: The clay and spray combo are amazing combos - the wash formula is also very effective. I have a lot more detailing to do, but I am already impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Lenzerini

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Kit comes with literally everything you need to wash your car, and then some. I usually keep it relatively simple - (1) wash with soap and water (2) detail spray + claybar (3) wax The only thing I bought in addition to this kit were these sponges ( Soap works great, and this is the same claybar I've used for years. Have yet to test out the ScratchX, and PlastX is actually recommended for clearing up foggy headlights!
customer_reviews.author: K. S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be in sturdier bottles or packed in bigger box with protection
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, comes with everything it says and in a nice quantity. BUT bottles are flimsy and could be thicker. the Liquid wax bottle was split down the side and had leaked all over everything. I will be contacting them about it in hopes to get a replacement bottle (because i do want it!). If I'm able to get a replacement for it i will definitely be updating my review to 5 stars. Got the replacement real quick, undamaged too. With no hassle too, just submitted the complaint and it was sent right out!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: No wheel cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great set. Bought it for my new car so I could learn to detail it myself. Shame there's no wheel cleaner though. I would also suggest buying more towels and rags if you get this set. As well as additional applicator pads.
customer_reviews.author: Herman White

customer_reviews.title: nice kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good kit. I would have liked a few extras (maybe a glass cleaner and wheel brush; at the very least a few more towels), but this covers most of the basics. I haven't yet used the PlastX or ScratchX. I also used the detail spray and clay bar from a Mother's kit I already had (but I fully expect the Meguiar's versions to be on par with the other products in the kit).
customer_reviews.author: boolittlek

customer_reviews.title: good for the price lot of different stuff here
customer_reviews.text: alot of bang for the buck i mean there is alot of stuff in this kit not little sample bottles either but I did have to go get compound and polish I mean lets get real scratch x ain't gonna do it all can't just wax it all away either feel its a little misleading but try buying all this separately its still a good deal but its not complete like it says so it gets 4 not 5 but some really nice xtras tho
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: Great for a quick detail
customer_reviews.text: This is a great simple detail kit. Got this for my husband who is a total car guy and he says it’s a great kit for a quick detail. Has everything he needs for when he is at a car show or just in the garage and wants to do a quick clean up of the cars.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing. I have only washed my car so far and I am absolutely loving the results. I have the car parked in the garage awaiting scratch removal, clay bar and wax sometime this week. I will update post with pics once complete.
customer_reviews.author: MIGO

customer_reviews.title: Everything a consumer needs.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is just about all you'll need to properly clean your vehicle as far as compounds and chemicals go. Please read the instructions, and Google a pro's instructions on how to properly clean your vehicle. Set aside one day for a proper cleaning (IE wash & scrub, clay bar, polish, wax, etc..) Do it right the first time and enjoy a beautiful mirror like exterior with a wash every weekend to keep it looking good. (I try to utilize the entire kit once per month or every 2 months.)
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Chance

customer_reviews.title: Meguiar's is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome kit. I never knew how good Meguiar was until I got this kit. Absolutely love the quick detailing spray. Did you know birds poop on red cars more often than other? Buy a red car and find out. All the stuff you need to do a complete detailing is there. I would suggest getting the extra 3 pack of Meguiars micro fiber cloths.
customer_reviews.author: James Wohler

customer_reviews.title: Great value for great products. Excellent gift.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas gift for a men’s exchange. Everyone was impressed with the value for the money. Great variety of products. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Harry C.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use most of the products. item came damaged and wax was spread all over the items. This item was purchased as a Christmas gift. Cant return item as the box is saturated in chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great value car wash kit
customer_reviews.text: Still using this set years later. Keeps the car looking new and clean. Don't accidentally get wax on the headlights or they will fog.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Get it every year for my nephew for Christmas He doesn't use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really good deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my fiancé who is trying to start his own business working with body work on cars. He opened it and freaked out wondering how much I paid for it. Thinking like a hundred or more 😭 but when he fingered out how much, he said I got an insane deal!
customer_reviews.author: Haylee

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a great kit. Don't get me wrong there are a ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a great kit. Don't get me wrong there are a few things which I don't think are that great but still do the job. For instance the scratch remover personally didn't work too great for my car even the smaller scratches. And the interior cleaner seems to be nothing more than windex to be honest. But the headlight cleaner and the wax are definitely top notch. For such an inexpensive kit you can't really ask for much more. Only suggestion would be for another foam applicator to be included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshopper617

customer_reviews.title: Good Kit Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit for total beginners or as a gift. The price is much cheaper than buying individually which is great. As for what is included, it is all good quality products as Meguiar's tends to sell. This is really geared to a beginner since someone with more detailing experience or who has done it longer will already have most of this kit, so it would be better to buy other individual products rather than this and ending up with tons of bottles of scratch-X and plast-X which are used much less than say wax and shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Works well and makes car shine
customer_reviews.text: Boutht as a gift but heard back that it works great. All the products still lasting strong and doing a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in box
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the amount of products but I was planning to give as a gift and received it busted and opened. Couldn't use two of the products at all due to damage and others were salvageable but looked terrible. Couldn't return due to time but next time I would order well in advance and check thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Meguiars Kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2, because my friend said it was a good price. I thought the plastic cleaner and treatment was for the plastic around my truck. It was for cleaning headlamp covers. That's the only thing I would have preferred something else in replacement of. However, the rest made my new Denali Truck look great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas for th e car
customer_reviews.text: total setup. husband loves. I love. works amazing. has it all
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal . Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this . I didn't realize everything was in the boxs still . But great value. Really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jack F

customer_reviews.title: got it on sale for $30
customer_reviews.text: bought it as a gift , they were impressed with what they got
customer_reviews.author: carlos rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product, easy application and usage, some items is lower quantity
customer_reviews.author: Mario Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used for my bike and really effective. Still don't know the use of something in a black box?
customer_reviews.author: Victor Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Extensive kit
customer_reviews.text: I love the car wash kit. It came with everything pictured. Many amazing smelling products from Meguiar's.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Simon

customer_reviews.title: Car looked brand new
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband It was his favorite his car looked like glass
customer_reviews.author: ileen scerbo

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Great for anybody that loves taking care of their car
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Detail your car with this quality all-in-one kit.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product line bundled in a full kit. Great number of quality of products for the price. I didn't need every product that comes in it, such as the clay bar.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product set for DIY car clean up.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of products to use on any vehicle. So far have used all the products on my Subaru BRZ in black and it made it look like show room quality. Not sure about the interier cleaner, but it smells good and is more of a water based cleaner for minimal dust removal
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Lot of great stuff, covers everything to make a car special
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meguiar's Car Care Kit
customer_reviews.text: Got this kit for my sis and bro-in-law for their new van. I think they really like this stuff. I told them Meguiar's was the best and it's the only stuff I use on my car, even though it's really old. Meguiar's IS the best stuff for your car.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Liver

customer_reviews.title: Good quality products.
customer_reviews.text: Like the set, haven’t used it all. Really love the quick detailer for exterior of vehicle. Make my truck shine.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: New Meguiar Fan
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this kit while Amazon had an amazingly priced gold deal. These products work wonderfully on my car. The kit comes with a lot of stuff as you can tell, and each thing does its job great. The scratch remover was awesome for little tiny scratches I had on the surface of my car. All the washes for interior and exterior worked beautifully also. My tires came out looking great. The wax provided is also quite good.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss car products
customer_reviews.text: Bunch of liquids and gels but not everything is very affective. The shampoo is great, foams well. Everything else is generic quality.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Huang

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: Literally everything you need to take care of your vehicle. The clay bar is a little on the small side but is enough for a full sized car. I can't think of anything this kit doesn't come with and Meguiar's has a great reputation. I got this on a "daily deal" for under $50 which is a lot less than you would pay for everything separately at a box store. Great value and great results.
customer_reviews.author: QMG

customer_reviews.title: ... for what you'd need to give your car a nice wash. The problem I faced was when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Comes with more than enough stuff for what you'd need to give your car a nice wash. The problem I faced was when I clayed my sedan I went through about half of the quick detail which is recommended for this process. Not the biggest problem as I purchased it on amazon inexpensively.
customer_reviews.author: DARK

customer_reviews.title: The inner box was crushed but fortunately nothing was damaged
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift but everything was included as expected. The inner box was crushed but fortunately nothing was damaged. I used to get him a cheaper 17 dollar kit and this one just looks so much better than that!!
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived busted and leaking
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed in the packaging of these items. One of the bottles had a broken cap. I bought this gift for my husband for Christmas. I watched as he opened his gift only to find out that the broken bottle had exploded all over the entire package. It completely wasted all of the product.
customer_reviews.author: TheGraciez

customer_reviews.title: My car is sparkling Clean.
customer_reviews.text: All you need to get you vehicle showroom clean. Great products
customer_reviews.author: geo

customer_reviews.title: Great all-in-one kit
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you will need for your car and maybe a little extra. Hands down the best product to use your car and long lasting. It is much cheaper to buy as a complete kit like this. The mitt, sponge and towels are nice but not the highest quality but are nice back up or spares to have. The quick detail I went through the quickest because I use it more often but all the other products I feel like will last a long time because so little is needed.
customer_reviews.author: cjtexag

product_meta.title: MEGUIAR'S G55032SP Complete Car Care Kit
product_meta.description: The Meguiar's Complete Car Care Kit has inspired automotive enthusiasts worldwide to pamper, condition, and protect their treasured investments. This is one of the most complete kits on the market today, featuring Meguiar's premium-quality products in one convenient, affordable package. It includes one 16-ounce bottle of Gold Class Car Wash Shampoo and Conditioner - G7116, one 16-ounce bottle of Gold Class Carnauba Plus Liquid Wax - G7016, one 16-ounce bottle of Gold Class Endurance High Gloss Gel - G7516, one container of Quik Detailer - A3316, one 16-ounce bottle of Quik Interior Detailer Cleaner - G13616, two 50-gram clay bars with a clamshell container - R30-60-008, R30-60-120, one container of PlastX Clear Plastic Cleaner & Polish - G12310, one container of ScratchX - G10307, one microfiber towel - M9910, one foam applicator pad - R30-60-241, and one Microfiber Wash Mitt - X3002.
feature_bullets: COMPLETE CAR KIT: Includes 12 premium products to clean, shine and protect your paint, interior, wheels, bumpers and everything in between. Takes guesswork out of the equation.
GOLD CLASS CAR WASH: designed to blast away dirt and grime while boosting your car’s shine
GOLD CLASS CARNAUBA PLUS LIQUID WAX: keeps your car reflective and leaves long-lasting protection
ENDURANCE TIRE GEL: provides high gloss protection that keeps tires black with a dark gloss shine

ALSO INCLUDES: Clay Bars and Quik Detailer to remove bonded contaminants, ScratchX 2.0 to remove swirls and scratches, Quik Interior Detailer to clean and protect interior surfaces, PlastX Clear Plastic Cleaner & Polish to remove defects on uncoated clear plastics, and accessories

specifications.Model: Meguiar's G55032SP Complete Car Care Kit
